CRWN Clothing with Firebase Authentication

CRWN Clothing is an e-commerce web application built using React.js. The project utilizes several key skills, including the useContext hook for state management, React Router for handling routes, and Firebase for authentication.

Weather React App

This project is a weather app built with React that fetches data from the OpenWeatherMap API. The application displays current weather conditions, temperature, humidity and other important weather-related information for a given location.
